decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: JCA - MMW/1/OD1 - rev B Floor plans - proposed (as approved), JCA - MMW/1/OD2 - rev B Elevations & section - proposed (as approved), JCA - MMW/1/BLK Block plan - proposed (as approved), JCA - MMW/1/OD1 - rev C Floor plans - proposed revision, JCA - MMW/1/OD2 - rev C Elevations & section - proposed revision, JCA - MMW/1/BLK - rev A Block plan - proposed revision.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow to reduce the size of the rear side extension in relation to planning permission reference 234844FUL dated 25/01/2024 for 'Conversion of two self-contained flats into single dwellinghouse; conversion of garage into a utility room with bike / bin store with associated external alterations to garage; single storey rear/side extension; rear roof outrigger extension; alterations to rear roof extension fenestrations involving replacement of window with Juliet balcony; alterations to rear fenestrations involving replacement of door and window; installation of one rooflight to front roof slope; external alterations; black mock Tudor panelling to the first floor exterior walls'
